search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=diskio.io_time host=* name=* by metric_name, name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(diskio.*) as "*_counter" by _time, name | streamstats current=f last(*_counter) as "*_prev" by name | eval io_time=((io_time_counter-io_time_prev)) | fields _time, name, io_time | where NOT (io_time<0) | timechart useother=f limit=45 minspan=1m bins=1000 avg(io_time) as io_time by name
